//tightrope
#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
  int n,f=0,i;
  scanf("%d",&n);
  char space;
  scanf("%c",&space);
  char a[n];
  scanf("%s",&a);
  float angle,threshold,newangle;
  scanf("%f%f",&angle,&threshold);
  newangle=angle;
  if(angle>threshold)
  f=1;
  if(f==0)
  {
  for(i=1;i<n;i++)
  {
    if(a[i]==a[i-1])
    {
      newangle=newangle+angle;
      if(newangle>threshold)
      f=1;
    }
    else
    newangle=angle;
    if(f==1)
    break;
  }
  }
  if(f==1)
  printf("NO\n");
  else
  printf("YES\n");
  return 0;
}
